name: CENTER FOR SPORTFISHING POLICY (FKA CENTER FOR COASTAL CONSERVATION)
sampleDescriptions: Support HR2023/S1520 Modernizing Recreation Fishing and Boating Act; support fix to Billfish Conservation Act S396/HR1887; support Magnuson Stevens Act reauthorization.
